title: Ensure all requested admin rooms exist and add /admin/rooms landing page

requirements.summary: Audit requested admin rooms vs registered routes and admin nav; add missing admin rooms with working routes and visible Admin menu items, plus an in-code route mapping list.
acceptanceCriteria: A documented list exists in code (or in the PR description) mapping each requested room name to its route.
Every requested room has a corresponding route registered in `frontend/src/App.tsx` and an entry in `frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts` (unless explicitly noted as intentionally excluded).
Navigating to each requested room route renders a page (not a blank screen) and does not throw console errors.

file_operations.description: Add/verify the complete set of requested admin rooms as `ADMIN_NAV_ITEMS` entries (Admin menu source of truth) and add an exported in-code mapping list (e.g., `REQUESTED_ADMIN_ROOMS_ROUTE_MAP` or similar) that maps each requested room label to its route. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Audit admin route registrations against the requested admin rooms list and add any missing admin routes, ensuring each admin page is wrapped in `AdminRouteGuard` and existing routes remain unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an admin-guarded '/admin/rooms' landing page that lists all admin rooms from adminNav as responsive link cards and is accessible from the Admin menu.
acceptanceCriteria: `/admin/rooms` exists, is wrapped by `AdminRouteGuard`, and is accessible from the Admin menu.
The page lists all admin room links derived from `frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts` (label + icon + route), and each link navigates correctly.
Layout is responsive (mobile + desktop) with no overlapping text/images and no horizontal overflow.

file_operations.description: Create the Rooms landing page UI at `/admin/rooms` that renders a responsive grid/list of clickable cards sourced from `ADMIN_NAV_ITEMS` (or `getOrderedAdminNavSections()`), showing each itemâ€™s icon + label and navigating to its route; exclude the `/admin/rooms` item itself from the rendered list to avoid self-linking. Compose existing shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Card/Button/ScrollArea) without editing `frontend/src/components/ui/*`. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add an Admin menu item for the new Rooms landing page (label like 'Rooms', route `/admin/rooms`, icon, section, order) so it is visible in the Admin dropdown menu and usable as the entrypoint to all rooms. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Register the `/admin/rooms` route in the router and wrap it with `AdminRouteGuard`, wiring it to `AdminRoomsPage` so navigating to `/admin/rooms` renders the landing page. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
